vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_19.sol#7-14):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_19.sol#12)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_19.sol#13)
